name: diaristic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
similar to, or in the form of a diary (= a book in which you record thoughts or events each day): She speaks directly to the audience in one of the show's diaristic speeches. The structure of the novel is diaristic and anecdotal.
More examplesFewer examplesOther work in the show is less diaristic, more factual.He tells the story of their capture and their eventual release in a tight diaristic style.The album tracks have a personal, diaristic focus to them.
